claimskg.util.sparql package

Submodules

claimskg.util.sparql.sparql_offset_fetcher module

class claimskg.util.sparql.sparql_offset_fetcher.SparQLOffsetFetcher(sparql_wrapper, page_size, where_body, select_columns, prefixes='')

Bases: object

A class to fetch data from a SPARQL endpoint in a paginated manner with a specified page size and offset.

sparql_wrapper

The SPARQLWrapper instance used to perform SPARQL queries.

page_size

The number of results to fetch in a single page.

Type:

int

current_offset

The current offset in the SPARQL query.

Type:

int

where_body

The WHERE clause of the SPARQL query.

Type:

str

prefixes

Optional string containing the prefixes used in the SPARQL query.

Type:

str

select_columns

The SELECT clause of the SPARQL query.

Type:

str

count

The total count of results for the SPARQL query.

Type:

int

fetch_all()

Fetch all the results from the SPARQL endpoint.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries containing all the query results.

Return type:

list

next_page()

Fetch the next page of results from the SPARQL endpoint.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries containing the query results for the current page.

Return type:

list
